title.rendered: “IDF Issues Urgent Evacuation Notice: Protecting Civilians Amid Rising Threats in Gaza”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Due to numerous terrorist actions and shooting attacks towards the State of Israel from the eastern part of the humanitarian area, remaining in this area has become dangerous. Therefore, at this time, an adjustment of the area will be made. The adjustment is based on precise intelligence information indicating that the terrorist organization Hamas has placed terrorist infrastructure in an area designated as a humanitarian zone.

The early warning is being issued in order to minimize harm to the civilian population and to distance them from the combat area.

The IDF intends to act vigorously against the terrorist organizations, and therefore calls on the population remaining in the eastern neighborhoods of Khan Yunis to temporarily evacuate to the adjusted humanitarian area in Mawasi.

Evacuation operations are being carried out through SMS messages, recorded voice messages, phone calls, media broadcasts in Arabic, and flyers.

The IDF will continue to act against the terrorist organization Hamas, which uses the residents of Gaza as human shields for its activities and terrorist infrastructure.

Attached is an animated graphic of the adjusted humanitarian area in Mawasi and the evacuation area: https://bit.ly/4cMx5sD

Attached is a graphic of the adjusted area: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC210720243325436
